import React from "react" import s from "./Users.module.css" import axios from "axios" import ph from "../../assets/images/tetatet.jpeg" class Users extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { axios.get("https://social-network.samuraijs.com/api/1.0/users") .then(response => { this.props.setUsers(response.data.items) }) } render() { return
1 2 3 4 5
{this.props.users.map(u =>

{"u.location.city"}
)}
} } export default Users
